accessibilityLabel.announcementOnDetails: showing device action details. double tap on device history tab to close the modal
accessibilityLabel.helpCloseHiddenRow: Swipe right using two fingers to close options
accessibilityLabel.helpViewHiddenRow: Swipe left using two fingers to view more options
accessibilityLabel.messageCloseMenu: swipe left, using three fingers to close
accessibilityLabel.schedule.daysRow.mess: No days chosen. Please choose a day
accessibilityLabel.starIconHideDevices: Hide, add to dashboard marker, for all devices
accessibilityLabel.starIconHideSensors: Hide, add to dashboard marker, for all sensors
accessibilityLabel.starIconShowDevices: Show, add to dashboard marker, for all devices
accessibilityLabel.starIconShowSensors: Show, add to dashboard marker, for all sensors
addNewLocation.activateManual.bodyConten: Activate your TellStick by typing the activation code. The activation code is written on the label on the bottom of your TellStick.
addNewLocation.activateManual.invalidAct: The activation code you entered is invalid. Please check that it is entered correctly.
addNewLocation.activateManual.label: Activation Code
addNewLocation.activateManual.messageAlr: This Gateway has already been activated.
addNewLocation.locationName.invalidLocat: Location name can not be empty
addNewLocation.position.dialogueBodyPara: The geographic position is used for calculating correct sunrise and sunset times for scheduled events
If you want to skip this step you can just click next without entering anything
Press and hold the marker to change the position manually
addNewLocation.position.label: Address
addNewLocation.success.messageBodyParaOn: You have now taken the first step towards your smart home! Now you can start adding devices, view sensors, schedule devices and events and much more.
addNewLocation.success.messageBodyParaTw: If you want help or would like to learn tips and tricks on how to setup your smart home you can view our guides by clicking below
changeLog37.WizardTwo.description: There is also an updated settings screen to provide a better overview. The highlighted features of the installed version can be accessed from that screen as well if you wish to view them again.
changeLog37.WizardTwo.title: New settings screen
changeLog37.wizardOne.description: In this version we have added support for local control of your devices even if the connection to the cloud is lost. This works for TellStick Net v2 and TellStick Znet/Znet v2 and the phone needs to be connected to the same local network as the gateway.
changeLog37.wizardOne.title: Local control
dialogue.messageOnHide: Are you sure you want to hide this {type}?
error.addNewLocationFailed: Add new location could not be completed. Please try again
error.networkFailed: Network request failed. Please check your internet connection
error.unknownError: Unknown Error, Please try again later
form.login.fieldEmpty: Something seems to be missing in your form. Please check that both email and password are entered correctly.
form.register.fieldEmptyPostfix: seems to be missing in your form. Please check that it is entered correctly.
location.failureEditTimezone: Time zone could not be set
location.message.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this location? This action will remove all settings for this location.
modal.deleteScheduleDialogue: Are you sure you want to delete the schedule ?
name: Name
pages.dashboard.messageNoItemsContent: You have not added any devices or sensors to your dashboard yet. Go to devices or sensors tab, swipe left on the row and click the star to select the ones you want to add.
pages.devices.messageNoDeviceContent: Currently, adding devices is only possible through our web interface, live.telldus.com. Click below to open the web interface.
pages.devices.messageNoDeviceTitle: You have not added any devices yet.
pages.devices.messageNoGatewayContent: Before adding devices you need to add a gateway as a location in your account. Click below if you want to do that now.
pages.devices.messageNoGatewayTitle: You have not added a gateway yet.
schedule.noUpcommingSchedule: No upcoming schedules on this day
schedule.posterChooseTime: Choose a time for the action
schedule.posterEditDevice: Click the details you want to edit
settings.pushRegisterFailed: Failed to register for push. Please try again
settings.pushRegisterSuccess: This phone is now registered for push
toast.deleteScheduleFailure: Could not delete the shedule. Please try again later
toast.storeHistory: History for this sensor will now be stored
toast.storeNotHistory: History for this sensor will no longer be stored
toast.updateScheduleFailure: Could not save the shedule. Please try again later
user.accountCreated: Your account is created and you will now be logged in.
user.confirmMessage: An email is sent to you with a link to confirm your account. Please confirm your account within 24 hours, otherwise the account will be deleted.
user.contentLogoutConfirm: If you logout from your account you will have to add your devices to your dashboard manually.
user.emailAddressNotMatchBody: Email addresses don't match. Please check your entered email address.
user.emailNotValidBody: The email address you entered is not valid. Please check that your email address is entered correctly.
user.sessionLockedBodyParaOne: For some reason we can't connect your account right now.
user.sessionLockedBodyParaTwo: Make sure that your internet connection is working and retry by tapping the retry button below.
userAgreementHeaderPhrase: Please accept our updated {eula} to continue using the app
